title: Hagukumi Ai wa Maiban Komame ni: Toshishita Kareshi no 凸 Seichou Kiroku
original_name: はぐくみ愛は毎晩こまめに~年下カレシの凸成長記録~
sinopse:
Mayumi, a lawyer, has been dating for 6 months. Her boyfriend is talented, handsome, dedicated, and doting. But for some reason, she has never been embraced by him. Then suddenly one day he comes up with a surprising suggestion. This is a heartwarming love story about a doting relationship.

(Source: Bunkasha, translated)
